k3.content: as + adj/adv + as hoặc so + adj/adv + as

k5.content: She sings as beautifully as a singer.

k6.content: Cô ấy hát hay như ca sĩ.

k8.content: ADJ/ADV + đuôi -er + than / more + ADJ/ADV + than

k9.content: Ví dụ: Nam is taller than me. / My father drives more carefully than I do

k12.content: Nam is the tallest student in his class.

k13.content: Nam là học sinh cao nhất trong lớp.

k14.content: This is the most difficult problem in the book.

k15.content: Đây là vấn đề khó nhất trong sách.
